job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Software Engineer
Partner Software - Athens, GA
Partner Software is seeking a Mid-Level Full Stack Developer/Engineer for the Map Platform team. We are looking for a motivated developer who wants to own the design and development of an application used to process, analyze, and display geographic data.
If you have a desire to take lead on a project and build simple yet powerful programs, you will be a great fit. You will also enjoy the benefits of working in a small and fast paced business that is backed with the necessary resources to enhance your career and have your efforts play a key role in the success of the company.
What We Are Looking For
2+ years experience in Java development
Excellent analytical and problem solving skills
Strong communication skills and the ability to work closely with others
Demonstrated ability to work on small, focused teams
What Will Help You Stand Out
Experience with GIS
Experience with code versioning tools and process
